# uptimekuma_notification_clicksendsms (Resource)

ClickSend SMS notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_clicksendsms" "example" {
  name        = "ClickSend SMS Notification"
  is_active   = true
  login       = "your-clicksend-username"
  password    = "your-clicksend-api-key"
  to_number   = "+61412345678"
  sender_name = "UptimeKuma"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `login` (String, Sensitive) ClickSend account username
- `name` (String) Notification name
- `password` (String, Sensitive) ClickSend API key
- `sender_name` (String) Sender name or phone number
- `to_number` (String) Recipient phone number

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
